page.title: 07Education:Headmaster's view
page.content: 'I'm usually here from 8.15a.m.till 4.00p.m.At other times I have meetings which may go on until 6.00p.m. Sometimes I have meetings after this which go on until 10.00p.m.In that time I have to deal with over 6,000 people any of whom may visit me.I don't enjoy having to tell people that what they have done or proposing to do is wrong or would make life difficult or unpleasant for other people.For my job you need to have been to university and taken a degree.Then you need to have been on a teacher training course and to have wide experience of teaching.In this school there are 1600 pupils and 94 staff.The school caters for children from their 1st.to 7th years in Secondary Education.The exam pass rate is very good and we send pupils to Oxford and Cambridge Universities'
